title: Rainless Love in a Godless Land
overview: This drama is based on the animist mythology of the Amis tribe. At the end of time, all gods will leave before the last rain falls. Unexpectedly, the gods' plan to retreat is disrupted by an ordinary human girl. As the world moves towards the unknown, the girl discovers that the opportunity to undo destiny is tied to her and her guardian. With doomsday approaching, a love story between a human and a god is about to unfold.
